repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is manuscript of the commentary on the first chapter of the Yajurveda. Front guard cover faint black ink pen. In Devanagari kāṇḍabhāṣyaṃ In Granth vedabhāṣyaṃ vedabhāṣyaṃ bhaṭṭabhāskariyaṃ (didak? )kāṇḍabhāṣya.. Last folio has title : vedabhāṣyaṃ bhaṭṭabhāskarīyaṃ motalakāṇḍa? anta .

msItem.title: vedabhāṣyaṃ bhaṭṭabhāskariyaṃ (kāṇḍa 1)
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara
msItem.incipit: [1v] [begginning is broken not sure how many syllables are lost.] tya [ve]dān vijānāti [some syllables are lost due to broken folio] jubhṛt sakalaṃ (some syllables are lost due to broken folio.)
msItem.explicit: [182v] 7 [5 syllables lost due to damaged folio.] ke asomāpraṣame( further text is lost due to broken folio,.)

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio, 182 wriiten folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numberals in the left margin of the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Delicate folio. Many folio are broken badly.

additions.desc: Yajurvedabhāṣya Bhaṭṭabhāskarakṛta 1st kāṇḍa, 364 p. 7 l is written on the white paper in English.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vols 1-3 kāṇḍa 1 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit no. 9 Mysore Government Branch press 1896 .(Vol 1-10 available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
[1v] [begginning is broken not sure how many syllables are lost.] tya [ve]dān vijānāti [some syllables are lost due to broken folio] jubhṛt sakalaṃ (some syllables are lost due to broken folio.)
[182v] 7 [5 syllables lost due to damaged folio.] ke asomāpraṣame( further text is lost due to broken folio,.)
